## makeWaitMs() function

Factory function that creates a promise-returning function that waits `ms` milliseconds and do nothing (useful for example for delaying an HTTP request to an API).

**Signature:**

```typescript
makeWaitMs: (ms: number) => () => Promise<string>
```

</td></tr>
